definition: chemical industry, abbr. to 化工[hua4 gong1]
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
China Petrol and Chemical Industry Association (CPCIA)
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Shi2 you2 he2 Hua4 xue2 Gong1 ye4 Xie2 hui4
containing_words.word: 中国石油和化学工业协会

sentences.english: My company is located in Jinshan, Shanghai Chemical Industry Park, covering 61 acres.
sentences.chinese: 我公司位于上海金山化学工业区，占地61余亩。

sentences.english: These Procedures apply to the Shanghai Chemical Industry Area (hereinafter referred to as the SCIA ) established under the approval of the Municipal People's Government.
sentences.chinese: 本办法适用于市人民政府批准设立的上海化学工业区。

sentences.english: Solvents and chemicals industries, plastics industry, ceramics and refractory materials.
sentences.chinese: 溶剂及化学工业，塑胶业，陶瓷及耐火材等。

sentences.english: Some of the oil and chemical industries are built almost entirely around self-acting controls.
sentences.chinese: 石油化学工业的一些生产设施，已经用机器自动控制。

sentences.english: In chemical industry, polymerization is used to produce synthetic resins and elastomers.
sentences.chinese: 在化学工业中，聚合用于生产合成树脂和弹性体。

sentences.english: Many processes that are essential to the chemical industry use heterogeneous catalysts.
sentences.chinese: 很多重要的化学工业过程就是使用多相催化剂的。

sentences.english: Since the Panama poisonings , China is considering ways to corral the chemical industry.
sentences.chinese: 自从巴拿马投毒，中国正在考虑如何围栏化学工业。

sentences.english: Shell-and-tube heat exchangers are widely used in petrochemical industries.
sentences.chinese: 管壳式换热器是石油化学工业中最常见的设备。

sentences.english: The petroleum and chemical industries use condensers for hydrocarbons and other chemical vapours.
sentences.chinese: 石油化学工业中用冷凝器使烃类及其它化学蒸气冷凝。

sentences.english: Alginates were common raw materials in domestic chemical industry.
sentences.chinese: 海藻酸盐是日用化学工业中常用的原料之一。

sentences.english: Q18. Why are certain groups concerned about the growing influence of the chemical industry on agriculture?
sentences.chinese: 为什么某些团体担忧化学工业对农业日益增长的影响？

definition: chemical industry, abbr. of 化學工業|化学工业[hua4 xue2 gong1 ye4]/chemical engineering, abbr. of 化學工程|化学工程[hua4 xue2 gong1 cheng2]
